amendment.description: To require reporting to national consumer reporting agencies regarding Federal student loans in order to promote the responsible repayment of such loans and ensure the completeness of information contained in consumer credit reports and scores.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2062 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 2062 proposed by Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S13879-13881; text: CR S13879-13880) To require reporting to national consumer reporting agencies regarding Federal student loans in order to promote the responsible repayment of such loans and ensure the completeness of information contained in consumer credit reports and scores.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2062 proposed by Senator Durbin.
